00016 const ConstMap<int,std::string> AlgParamTypes = ConstMap<int,std::string>
00017     (cv::Param::INT,          "int")
00018     (cv::Param::BOOLEAN,      "bool")
00019     (cv::Param::REAL,         "double")
00020     (cv::Param::STRING,       "string")
00021     (cv::Param::MAT,          "cv::Mat")
00022     (cv::Param::MAT_VECTOR,   "std::vector<cv::Mat>")
00023     (cv::Param::ALGORITHM,    "Algorithm");

00034 MxArray get_param(const cv::Ptr<cv::FeatureDetector> &obj, const std::string &param)
00035 {
00036     MxArray val(static_cast<const mxArray*>(NULL));
00037     int paramType = obj->paramType(param);
00038     if (paramType == cv::Param::STRING) {
00039         val = MxArray( obj->getString(param) );     // obj->get<string>(param)
00040     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::BOOLEAN) {
00041         val = MxArray( obj->getBool(param) );       // obj->get<bool>(param)
00042     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::REAL) {
00043         val = MxArray( obj->getDouble(param) );     // obj->get<double>(param)
00044     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::INT ) {
00045         val = MxArray( obj->getInt(param) );        // obj->get<int>(param)
00046     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::MAT) {
00047         val = MxArray( obj->getMat(param) );        // obj->get<cv::Mat>(param)
00048     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::MAT_VECTOR) {
00049         val = MxArray( obj->getMatVector(param) );  // obj->get<vector<cv::Mat> >(param)
00050     } else {
00051         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Unsupported parameter: %s (%s)",
00052             param.c_str(), AlgParamTypes[paramType].c_str());
00053     }
00054     return val;
00055 }
00056 
00062 void set_param(cv::Ptr<cv::FeatureDetector> &obj, const std::string &param, MxArray val)
00063 {
00064     int paramType = obj->paramType(param);
00065     if (paramType == cv::Param::STRING) {
00066         obj->setString(param, val.toString());
00067     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::BOOLEAN) {
00068         obj->setBool(param, val.toBool());
00069     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::REAL) {
00070         obj->setDouble(param, val.toDouble());
00071     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::INT) {
00072         obj->setInt(param, val.toInt());
00073     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::MAT) {
00074         obj->setMat(param, val.toMat());
00075     } else if (paramType == cv::Param::MAT_VECTOR) {
00076         obj->setMatVector(param, val.toVector<cv::Mat>());
00077     } else {
00078         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Unsupported parameter: %s (%s)",
00079             param.c_str(), AlgParamTypes[paramType].c_str());
00080     }
00081 }
00082 }
00083 
00084 // Persistent objects
00085 
00087 int last_id = 0;
00089 map<int,Ptr<FeatureDetector> > obj_;
00090 
00098 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00099                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00100 {
00101     if (nrhs<1 || nlhs>1)
00102         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00103 
00104     if (last_id==0)
00105         initModule_nonfree();
00106     
00107     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00108     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00109     int id = 0;
00110     string method;
00111     if (rhs[0].isChar() && nrhs==1) {
00112         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00113         string detectorType(rhs[0].toString());
00114         // Temporary work-around of bug (#2585) in the OpenCV.
00115         Ptr<FeatureDetector> obj = (detectorType == "SimpleBlob")
00116             ? Ptr<FeatureDetector>(new SimpleBlobDetector) 
00117             : FeatureDetector::create(detectorType);
00118         if (obj.empty())
00119             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","FeatureDetector::create returned empty object");
00120         obj_[++last_id] = obj;
00121         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00122         return;
00123     }
00124     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00125         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00126         method = rhs[1].toString();
00127     }
00128     else
00129         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00130     
00131     // Big operation switch
00132     Ptr<FeatureDetector> obj = obj_[id];
00133     if (method == "delete") {
00134         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00135             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00136         obj_.erase(id);
00137     }
00138     else if (method == "type") {
00139         if (nrhs!=2)
00140             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00141         plhs[0] = MxArray(string(typeid(*obj).name()));
00142     }
00143     else if (method == "detect") {
00144         if (nrhs<3 || (nrhs%2)!=1)
00145             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00146         Mat mask;
00147         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00148             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00149             if (key=="Mask")
00150                 mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00151             else
00152                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00153         }
00154         
00155         Mat image(rhs[2].toMat());
00156         vector<KeyPoint> keypoints;
00157         obj->detect(image, keypoints, mask);
00158         plhs[0] = MxArray(keypoints);
00159     }
00160     else if (method == "read") {
00161         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00162             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00163         FileStorage fs(rhs[2].toString(),FileStorage::READ);
00164         obj->read(fs.root());
00165     }
00166     else if (method == "write") {
00167         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00168             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00169         FileStorage fs(rhs[2].toString(),FileStorage::WRITE);
00170         obj->write(fs);
00171     }
00172     else if (method == "name") {
00173         if (nrhs!=2) {
00174             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Wrong number of arguments");
00175         }
00176         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj->name());
00177     }
00178     else if (method == "get") {
00179         if (nrhs == 2) {
00180             // return a struct with all parameters and their values
00181             vector<string> params;
00182             obj->getParams(params);
00183             MxArray s = MxArray::Struct();
00184             for(vector<string>::const_iterator p = params.begin(); p != params.end(); ++p) {
00185                 s.set(*p, get_param(obj,*p));
00186             }
00187             plhs[0] = s;
00188         } else if (nrhs == 3 && rhs[2].isChar()) {
00189             // get parameter
00190             string param(rhs[2].toString());
00191             plhs[0] = get_param(obj, param);
00192         } else {
00193             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Wrong number of arguments");
00194         }
00195     }
00196     else if (method == "set") {
00197         if (nrhs == 2) {
00198             // return a list of all parameter names
00199             vector<string> params;
00200             obj->getParams(params);
00201             plhs[0] = MxArray(params);
00202         } else if (nrhs == 4 && rhs[2].isChar()) {
00203             // set parameter
00204             string param(rhs[2].toString());
00205             set_param(obj, param, rhs[3]);
00206         } else {
00207             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Wrong number of arguments");
00208         }
00209     }
00210     else {
00211         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Unrecognized operation");
00212     }
00213 }
